Literature.Title: Antiviral activity of antibiotic peptaibols, chrysospemins B and D, produced by Apiocrea sp. 14T against TMV infection.
Literature.Author: Kim YH, Yeo WH, Kim YS, Chae SY, Kim KS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans(no activity data),Aspergillus niger(no activity data),Pyricularia grisea(no activity data),Streptococcus sp.(no activity data),Colletotrichum lagenaria(no activity data),Fusarium solani(no activity data),Mucor racemosus(no activity data),Alternaria mali(no activity data),Tobacco mosaic virus (TMV)(90-100% Inhibition=100µg/ml),Tobacco mosaic virus (TMV)(50-60% Inhibition=10µg/ml),Human prostate adenocarcinoma PC-3(EC50=1.71µg/ml),Human lung carcinoma A549(EC50=3.40µg/ml),Human melanoma UACC-62(EC50=2.01µg/ml),Mouse T-lymphoma cells EL4(EC50=10.28µg/ml),Human myelogenous leukemia K562(EC50=1.09µg/ml)
